August 5, 2009

Countdown to private beta

Our goal is to go in private beta with some friends on mid-august. We got less than 30 tasks to resolved before…

Features on 1st beta:

  • Welcome message
  • Official rulesbook
  • News
  • Events
  • Photos
  • Forum
  • Locate place(s) on Google Map
  • Schedule
  • Teams
  • Players
  • Injuries

That’s all for now. Stay tuned...

October 3, 2009 We are online

We are happy to be online after several months of development. We are still in beta for few months...
